resources.string: Hill is an app intended to help initiate a long-term lifeline, hence the name. About a third of U.S. adults have no additional money set aside for retirement. Social Security alone does not provide enough financial security for seniors. With an average annual amount of $18,000, many seniors might discover they are unable to retire. But with a quick search of available retirement accounts, you can start planning for a worry-free retirement! Are you ready to establish your lifeline?

Roth IRAs are for individuals who want their money to grow tax-free. Traditional IRAs are for individuals who want to delay paying taxes until you withdraw funds from your account during retirement. Basically, you are determining when and how you will get your tax break.
